title: `quarkus.native.builder-image` default value unclear in documentation
body:
### Description

The [building native image guide](https://quarkus.io/guides/building-native-image) shows `${platform.quarkus.native.builder-image}` as the default value for `quarkus.native.builder-image` property. This is not really very useful for the average reader of the guide. What's `platform.quarkus.native.builder-image`? Where is it defined...etc?

Documentation should improve to extract the exact value of that and showing it. After some digging, it would appear to come from places like `https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-platform/blob/2.6.2.Final/generated-platform-project/quarkus/properties/pom.xml#L15`, e.g.

```
    <platform.quarkus.native.builder-image>quay.io/quarkus/ubi-quarkus-native-image:21.3-java11</platform.quarkus.native.builder-image>
```

### Implementation ideas

_No response_
